This is the onmaRg library

It is primarily used to quickly and easily load Ontario Marginalization data:

```{r}
library(onmaRg)

OnMarg_16_DA_df <- om_data(2016, "DAUID")

OnMarg_16_DA_sf <- om_geo(2016, "DAUID")

```
